episode_event_aprilfool_2024/4001_1001_0: You. Did. It. Again! Didn’t you?!

...OK, yes—I was fiddling with machines, but not
even I would make enough mistakes to cause THIS
many blackouts!

And weren’t YOU the one who reinforced Pasio’s
electrical systems specifically to avoid outages like
these happening?
Well... Yes, I suppose that’s true.

So yeah, this blackout isn’t only on me. Something
strange is going on.
episode_event_aprilfool_2024/4001_1001_1:
I don’t know where they’re coming from, but
unusual numbers of Ghost-type Pokémon are
gathering here.
These old bones can feel it... Something’s amiss.
You see? Even Bertha agrees with me.

Bertha? I’m Agatha! What a rude young man you
are, mixing up people’s names!

Oh, sorry about that. It’s so dark in here, I can’t
see all that well.

At any rate... Is there no chance the power will
come back on soon?

Probably not... If it wasn’t Volkner’s tinkering that
caused this, it may take some time to fix.
I’d expect us to be stuck in the dark for a while.
I see. We’d best be careful, then.

Indeed. After all, those you encounter in the
darkness may not all be of this world...
episode_event_aprilfool_2024/4001_1001_2:
Be very careful if you speak to anyone today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
episode_event_aprilfool_2024/6001_1001_0:
Pasio’s electrical system has been well-reinforced.
It shouldn’t be so easy for blackouts to just happen
like this.

Maybe this is just a prank played by some ghost
Pokémon... I hope so, anyway.
episode_event_aprilfool_2024/4002_1001_0:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Well? Did
anything strange happen?
episode_event_aprilfool_2024/4002_0401_0:
I hear that. Something pretty weird happened
here, too.
episode_event_aprilfool_2024/4002_1001_0:
Apparently it was some Electric-type Pokémon
up to mischief that caused this blackout.
Chew marks were found on the power cables.
Sheesh... Those Pokémon are such a pain...
episode_event_aprilfool_2024/4002_1001_1:
I’m about to go fix the cables now. Come along
with me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
